messages.title: LARRY SAYS...
messages.content: I grew up Brooklyn, New York, with my brother Bernie Sanders, a champion of progressive politics. We believe healthcare is a right for all people. I am fighting to save the NHS, which is in crisis. As your MP I demand that the top 1% pay their taxes. This is a rich country. We can have good healthcare, education and housing. We can create hundreds of thousands of worthwhile jobs in green energy and insulating all our buildings. We can have a society that works for all its people.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN'T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS. IT'S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS.
messages.content:
The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality.

To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment. To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizens' democracy.

If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters. Vote Green Party on 8th June.

Demanding that the top 1% pay their taxes.
Shaping an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
Creating hundreds of thousands of worthwhile jobs in green energy and insulating all our buildings.
Putting power back in your hands through a citizens' democracy.
